gitbigcommits.report_layer package¶

Submodules¶

gitbigcommits.report_layer.git_html_report module¶

gitbigcommits.report_layer.git_html_report.console_output()[source]¶
Returns:None

The output will be printed in the std output This will be called when the command-line command cygitcheck is invoked.

use: cygitcheck <GitFolderPath> <ThresholdSize> GitFolderPath denotes where “.git” folder is

present

Eg: cygitcheck ‘/usr/home/viswesh/myrepo’ 1024

gitbigcommits.report_layer.git_html_report.dorm_branch_html_output()[source]¶

This is to find the dormant branch present in your repo.

Input to this method is two environmental variables.
1)GIT_FOLDER_DIR 2)GIT_DORMANT_TIME default value is 50 days. set to 0 to find all branch

info :return: None4320000

gitbigcommits.report_layer.git_html_report.fat_html_output()[source]¶

This writes the output into a html file ‘git_fat_files.html’.

gitbigcommits.report_layer.git_html_report.get_output_list(git_folder=None, threshold_size=None)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • git_folder – Location of git repo folder.
  • threshold_size – size in KB
Returns:

list of dictionary with all info

This will generate a list of the big commits in your repo. The input to the methos is your git directory, and the threshold file size.

It can be set in the enviornmental variable “GIT_FOLDER_DIR” and “GIT_FILE_SIZE” eg: export GIT_FOLDER_DIR=”usr/home/myrepo/” export GIT_FILE_SIZE=”1024” size is in Kb
